CustomField.description: I want a given product to be assigned to a given category only once. This field works with the flow MakeSureThereIsNoProductCategoryConnectionAlready__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: I want a given product to be assigned to a given category only once. This field works with the flow MakeSureThereIsNoProductCategoryConnectionAlready__c
CustomField.label: Technical Product Category Unique Helper
